Hi!
I found a strange bug, using dom objects in JSP. Since Tomcat 6 and higher JSP page compiler throws Exception: The method getElementsByTagNameNS(String, String) is undefined for the type Element.
How can it be? Method getElementsByTagNameNS must be define and it is define in Xerces Parser (last version), for example.
I can use method getElementsByTagName, instead, but problem stay...
